title: AI has a "Spiritual Bliss Attractor"

author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Check out my introduction to quantum mechanics course on Brilliant! Get your first 30 days free as well as 20% off an annual premium subscription when you use my link ➜ https://brilliant.org/sabine.

In the Big Bang Theory, the cosmic microwave background — microwave-range radiation that floats through the entire universe at a steady 2.7 Kelvin — is evidence that a hot explosion of plasma kicked off the creation of the universe. But according to a new paper, the microwave radiation came from early galaxies instead. Does this mean that the big bang theory is wrong? Let’s take a look.

Paper: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0550321325001403?via%3Dihub

This video comes with a quiz which you can take here: https://quizwithit.com/start_thequiz/1750090373768x381707884828557300

👉 Transcri
title: Is the Cosmic Microwave Background a Huge Mistake?
